ai-atk-abh03a63:1_1: Now, as to the profitable conditions that are skillful and unskillful, because of the profitable states opposite sex, they don’t give rise to the unskillful qualities that are skillful or unskillful, because of the cause, because of the reason for the sake of their profitable state.
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_2: Not doing those unskillful things, they can’t get rid of the skillful.
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_3: He should not give rise to the three skillful things: “Practicing skillful qualities arise in a single constituent parts of the body, the mind, and the three unwholesome minds of the physical phenomena, observed by the donors, it should be given up.”
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_4: In that place where the group of five is called “proaching.”
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_5: Those who, having given it away, will give it away,
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_6: Therefore all of them should be understood as it is reckoned in the way already described.
ai-atk-abh03a63:1_7: And here it is in whatever place the sacrificial position that is to say, as hard to mount the three waves places where it is done.
ai-atk-abh03a63:3_0: At the very place of the three worlds: this supreme blessing.
ai-atk-abh03a63:4_0: Kindly means both bad and badly.
ai-atk-abh03a63:6_0: In the six kinds of brought together:
ai-atk-abh03a63:7_0: in what is said in the Council Hall,
ai-atk-abh03a63:7_1: There is no place for settling about the Dhamma in the place where the sun comes.
ai-atk-abh03a63:7_2: But here there is one place opposite for four months and four immaterial states, one each for four months, and four opposites, and four months should be understood as the merely in each case.
